title: Silly clocks for free
summary: Free silly walk watch faces for Sony SmartWatch 2&3, and Wear watches
description: So you're looking for great watchfaces for your Wear- and Smart- watches for free. And by great you actually mean silly. And for free you mean as in free beer and a lunch.Then you've come to the right app, because this one contains all the free sillyness you need. What you will find is a number (2) of free clock widgets closely resembling the silly walk characters sketch in Monty Python.There are 2 different watch faces to choose from on the SmartWatch 2, and 3 to choose from on the Wear- and Smart- watches.Sport a great, fun, silly and most of all FREE watch on your wrist. I do. :)Graphical assets provided by http://costela.net/ and licensed under CC-BY-SA https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/﻿
descriptionHTML:
So you're looking for great watchfaces for your Wear- and Smart- watches for free. And by great you actually mean silly. And for free you mean as in free beer and a lunch.

Then you've come to the right app, because this one contains all the free sillyness you need. What you will find is a number (2) of free clock widgets closely resembling the silly walk characters sketch in Monty Python.

There are 2 different watch faces to choose from on the SmartWatch 2, and 3 to choose from on the Wear- and Smart- watches.

Sport a great, fun, silly and most of all FREE watch on your wrist. I do. :)

Graphical assets provided by http://costela.net/ and licensed under CC-BY-SA https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0/﻿
comments: disappointing nice idea, but cannot see the "hands" (legs) against the body, so cannot tell the time.
Good fun! cracks me up every time!
Hilarious Free smiles, what's not to like
